Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails, and mentally prepare for the day. Drink a cup of green tea.
Meet with @itpm-1 to discuss project timelines, resource allocation, and potential risks. Collaborate on a detailed project schedule with milestones and deadlines.
Finalize the workflow diagram and technical specifications based on input from the IT Project Manager and the EHR vendor liaison.
Present the proposed changes and the workflow diagram to @clinlead-1 to get approval. Highlight the benefits of the new data collection process for influenza trend analysis.
Address any concerns or questions from the Clinical Lead and make any necessary adjustments to the plan.
Lunch Break - Meet up with some colleagues at the cafe.
Begin drafting training materials for the patient registration staff on how to administer the new influenza questionnaire and enter the data into the EHR system. Send the draft to @trainer-1.
Meet with @da-1 and @da-2 to discuss the data analysis plan for the collected influenza data. Determine the key metrics to track and reporting requirements.
Collaborate with @dba-1 to design the database schema for storing the new influenza data. Ensure data integrity, security, and efficient retrieval.
Review the day's accomplishments, update the project plan, and respond to emails.
Look at some funny video online.
